divs: Sighting Detailsi was out side in my front yard calling my kids at around dark and just happened to look to the west and i saw a pinkish red orb silently crossing the sky and went down behind the treeline a few miles away.at first i thought it was fireworks but it left no trail behind it, there was no trail of smoke or light emitting from behind the object, i heard no sounds coming from it. i was really puzzled because i have never seen anything like it before.
Summary: it was a pinkish red orb that emitted no sound
